Administration.text:
Type:
Corticosteroid
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: oral, IV/IM
Common Trade Names:

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
0.5-0.75 mg/kg/day
OR
20-25 mg/m(2)/day PO in 3 doses
0.25-0.35 mg/kg/day
OR
12.5 mg/m(2)/day IM

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: D
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing: no adjustment
Hepatic dosing: no adjustment

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Systemic fungal infections (except when used for replacement therapy in adrenal insufficiency)
Concomitant administration of live or live attenuated vaccines

Serious.text:
Adrenocortical insufficiency
Hyperglycemia
Cataract, glaucoma
Osteoporosis

Common.text:
Hypertension
Increased infection risk, poor wound healing
Skin atrophy
Cushing syndrome
Growth impairment
Depression, euphoria
